definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: This guy's a wily old bird. Don't believe what he says.
sentences.chinese: 這人是個老油條了，你別太相信他。

sentences.english: This spin did not convince old pros on Wall Street.
sentences.chinese: 這個說法並不能說服華爾街的老油條。

sentences.english: That guy is a slippery customer.
Not even a week in here and you're already working it like an old con.
sentences.chinese: 來這兒還不到一週，你做起事兒來就像是個老油條。

definition: hot pot containing stinky tofu and other ingredients (Taiwanese dish)
fish maw/a food dish made from the swim bladder of fish
produce/fresh fruits and vegetables/fresh aquatic food/fresh herbs
to eat one's fill/to be full
